content: ↑ ⑳e snow day leg warmers &p & *id t to * ->↑ by meadow do these are a simple 2x2 rib tube with a tubular bind off to ensure a snug fit at the top cozy cute coquette enjoy the falling snowflakes and your day off n &-- e #-ii n ↑ b * & b- - &o * d - & u l t j- e # *- -b - -r a i rt n&t & a& ↑ ⑤ epo g gauge 18 stitches = 10cm on 4 5mm us 7 needles suggested materials -160g/220m aran weight yarn instructions sample uses cascade 220 1 co 64 st using the german twisted cast on superwash aran in white sands method -4 5mm us 7 circular needles 2 place marker and join in the round 40cm/16 or magic loop 3 knit in 2x2 half twisted rib ktbl2 p2 until piece measures 28 cm from the co edge or finished size desired length 4 decrease round k2tog p2tog ktbl2 p2 x 7 approximate size after blocking k2tog p2tog *ktbl2 p2 repeat from * to end 31 cm long adjustable 60 st 13 cm wide unstretched 5 transpose into 1x1 rib great tutorial here also includes a tubular bind off https //youtu be/ abbreviations mvqp8r02rqa si=51hpzldfrlhabetz 6 double knit for 12 rounds =6 row of double k - knit knitting you may need to switch to magic p - purl loop if things start getting too tight ktbl - knit through the back loop 7 cast off using a tubular bind off co - cast on 8 prior to weaving in bind off ends try on the leg st - stitches warmer pull the tail to secure the desired k2tog - knit 2 together tightness of the top cuff weave the tail to the p2tog - purl 2 together back of the work and secure with a double knot then weave the rest of the tail in 9 weave in all other ends and block if desired 10 repeat all steps for the second leg warmer 11 eee all done go forth and be adorable - - y e & - e- fn↳ ⑬↑ &- b a m
